seo.title: Vernazza Weather 2025 | Climate Guide & Best Time to Visit
seo.description: Complete weather guide for Vernazza. Monthly climate data, best times to visit, and what to expect throughout the year in Cinque Terre.

body.title: Weather & Climate Guide
body.subtitle: Mediterranean climate with mild winters and warm summers. Plan your visit with detailed weather information for Cinque Terre's most beautiful village.

features.title: Best Months
features.description: May, June, September - perfect weather with fewer crowds.

features.title: Summer (Jul-Aug)
features.description: Warm 25-30°C. Peak season with most tourists.

features.title: Spring (Apr-May)
features.description: Mild 18-23°C. Wildflowers and ideal hiking conditions.

features.title: Fall (Sep-Oct)
features.description: Pleasant 20-25°C. Harvest season with clear skies.

features.title: Winter (Nov-Mar)
features.description: Cool 8-15°C. Quieter but some services closed.

features.title: Swimming Season
features.description: May through September with water temps 20-25°C.
